title: Inside this week Westmeath Independent | Westmeath Independent
body_text:
Inside this week's Westmeath Independent
Here's a look at some of the stories you'll find in this week's Westmeath Independent, which is out now:
-New vision for Athlone's Connaught Street envisioned
-Record numbers flock to Moate Show
-Progress on plan for Monksland community hub
-New Credit Union merger officially launched in Athlone
-New LIDL in Ballymahon on track to open later this year
-Pride and sense of achievement for Leaving Cert class of 2025
-Construction work starts on first phase of Center Parcs expansion
-Royal link celebrations for Mount Temple horse breeder
-Coosan Men's Shed members stress need for bigger premises
-Celebrations mark 200th anniversary of Dysart Church
PHOTOS: From the Moate CS Graduation, Mercy School Kilbeggan Graduation and Moate Show
AND IN SPORT
-UEFA Women's Champions league preview as Athlone prepare for second qualifying round of competition in the Netherlands
-Athlone Town women return to summit with vital victory
-Mount Temple's Clare wins gold at World Transplant Games
-Match reports from the Westmeath Football Championships
-Athlone Hockey Club aiming to build on season's success
-PHOTOS: Athlone Golf Club President's Prize Presentation
